Pre-Game Insights: Quentin Grimes has stepped up in the absence of Luka Doncic, averaging 15.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 4 assists in the seven games Doncic has missed.
Kyrie Irving is expected to miss the game due to a series of injuries.
Portland has relied on a balanced attack, with six scorers in double figures in their recent game against the New Orleans Pelicans.
